long_description: The sporty Olympus Roamer 8 x 21 DPC 1 binoculars feature well-designed optics for a clear and bright view. A compact design and light weight make them ideal for roaming far and wide. Fully coated, antireflective lenses reduce UV rays, glare and eyestrain. BK-7 reverse porro prisms provide great color fidelity and brightness. Center focus knob quickly brings your subject into sharp focus; right diopter adjusts focus to match your eyesight. Olympus Roamer 8 x 21 DPC 1 binoculars come with a case and neck strap for convenience.
short_description: The sporty Olympus Roamer 8 x 21 DPC 1 binoculars feature well-designed optics for a clear and bright view. A compact design and light weight make them ideal for roaming far and wide.
